definition: to refer to/to be used in place of
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Symbols are signs that refer to the object by a convention.
sentences.chinese: 標誌是一種人們習慣性指代某種事物的符號。

sentences.english: In medicine and anatomy, the use of the term to refer to the telencephalon.
sentences.chinese: 醫學及解剖學上，多用大腦指代端腦。

sentences.english: At least 10 prizes will be awarded and, in addition, honorary mentions.
sentences.chinese: 至少10獎金將被授予榮譽，除此之外，指代消解。

sentences.english: Can you work out what the underlined words refer to?
sentences.chinese: 你能弄明自下邊劃線的單詞指代的含義嗎？

sentences.english: Hamdan said he did not know what they mean by the dome.
sentences.chinese: 但Hamdan說他不知道圓頂指代的是什麼。

sentences.english: I mean to be talking about the entire train.
The aim of this paper is to discover the reference of topicalized personal dual gender nouns.
sentences.chinese: 分析主題化人稱雙重性別名詞的指代問題爲本文主旨。

sentences.english: And depending on the context, it can mean a variety of things.
sentences.chinese: 結合上下文，這可以指代許多事情。

sentences.english: It is also the color associated with clothing made for elderly ladies.
sentences.chinese: 它也用來指代老婦人的服色。

sentences.english: This relatedness is the basis for metonymy and euphemisms are used to stand for the euphemized subjects.
sentences.chinese: 這種聯繫是轉喻的基礎，委婉語用來指代其婉指對象。

sentences.english: Anaphora resolution plays an important role in text information processing.
sentences.chinese: 指代消解是文本信息處理中的一個重要任務。

sentences.english: The term service has been used in the industry to denote a variety of things.
sentences.chinese: 服務這一術語已經被業界被用來指代過很多事物了。

sentences.english: Be sure that pronouns clearly refer to nouns.
sentences.chinese: 確定代詞清晰地指代了相關名詞。

sentences.english: Coreference resolution plays an important role in natural language processing.
sentences.chinese: 指代消解是自然語言處理領域中的一個重要問題。

sentences.english: In this research, the role and the mechanism of prosodic features in disambiguating demonstrative ambiguous sentences were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了韻律特徵對指代歧義的解歧作用及其機制。

definition: alternative name/to refer to sth by another name/antonomasia
to make a general reference/to be used in a general sense
to extend (the meaning of a word, an analogy etc)/derivation
to use sth as a metaphor
word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases)/term (e.g. technical term)/expression
meaning (implicit in a phrase)/implied meaning/hidden meaning/hint/connotation
